name: ULAplus 10th Anniversary Collection
description:
• Over 300 legal-to-distribute games including:
    • Classics from over 30 publishers including Bug Byte, Gargoyle, Gremlin, Imagine, Melbourne House, Ocean, Psion and Vortex.
    • Games written specifically for ULAplus™ from John Blythe, Jonathan Cauldwell, Andy Johns and the Mojon Twins.
  • 20 demos including slideshows and technical demos.
  • All titles provided in .tap format for use with emulators and real hardware.
  • 50 palette files to use with games not included in the collection.
  • Source code for the HAM256 and HAM8x1 software video modes.
  • Windows tools:
    • Image2ULAplus
    • MakeSlideshow
    • SpecEmu
    • WinAGD
    • ZX-Paintbrush
  • 256 color palette files in .aco and .pal format. 
  • Full technical documentation.
